metadata.title: CVE-2018-10100 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Before WordPress 4.9.5, the redirection URL for the login page was notvalidated or sanitized if forced to use HTTPS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.5+dfsg1-1').
